stories.text:
My startup is seeing good traffic to the site with an average session duration of just over one minute. However, we are not converting.

Everything I read online just comes across as an SEO blog post looking to get me to purchase their product - maybe I'm wrong and just ignorant to the strategies.

There is a lot of amazing information here on HN and I've meet a lot of really cool people so I thought I would shoot the question.

What makes a good product page? Is that an impossible question to answer as everything is unique?

I don't want to post my startups link here because I don't want it to come off as advertising. I'm honestly curious as to what you all have learned over the years.

Thank you all for your time.
stories.title: Ask HN: What makes a good product page?
